ISSUE.TITLE: Filter problems per user on the page /compta/sociales/list.php
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug In the htdocs/compta/sociales/list.php page, if filter per user i have a blank page I had to change $ Search_users = getpost ('Search_users', 'Intcomma'); to $search_users = GETPOST('search_users', 'array:int'); then it works I don't know if the problem is only with php 8.3 not supported ### Dolibarr Version 20.0.3 ### Environment PHP 8.3.15 ### Environment Database mariadb ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_
